activation.ReallyYourEmail: O lau tuatusi imeli moni lea, {{1}}? Afai o lea, kiliki iinei e seti ai lau passphrase ma fa ªagaoioia lau teugatupe.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Ole feso'ota'iga lea e unsubscribe pe afai e te le mana'o e toe maua nisi imeli.

charge.HasBeenCharged: Ei, ua na'o le ta'u atu ia te oe {{1}} ua molia {{2}} mo {{3}} e {{4}}

charged.HavePaid: Talofa {{1}}, ua na'o se fa'amaoniga vave ua e totogia lelei {{2}} ia {{3}} mo {{4}}

resend.YouAreReceiving: O lo'o e mauaina lenei imeli ona o se tasi na ulufale i lau tuatusi imeli ma kiliki "galo passphrase". Afai e le o oe, aua le amanaiaina lenei savali.
resend.Reset: Ina ia toe setiina lau fuaitau, kiliki {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Talofa {{1}}, ua amata lau saofaga i {{2}} ma {{3}} i {{4}} mo {{5}} masina.
subscription.HasStarted: E na'o le fa'ailoa atu ia te oe {{1}}, ua amata la latou saofaga i {{2}} ma {{3}} i {{4}} mo {{5}} masina.
